name: Findy List
description:
No ads. No in-app purchases. Just you, some clues, and a pile of letters that need order restored. Solve crossword-like clues, then assemble groups of letters into words that satisfy the clue. Over 69 levels! (which means 70).

Not every puzzle is as straightforward as it seems. Fans of crossword puzzles and anagrams will get a kick out of Findy List.

Reviews and feedback are appreciated. Happy solving!
